title: Bodice (dress top)
description: heavily embroidered bodice--skirt has been removed; colors include gold, maroon, green, white, black, red; geometric patterns in wide bands; back of bodice not embroidered; woven silk piece at top in yellow and red--maroon below; embroidered band at waist; tufts of yarn in red and black on cuffs and center front, along shoulder seams and sleeve seams in front
